import React, { useState } from "react"; import { generatePublicUrl } from "../../../urlconfig"; import './index' export default function CartItem2(props) { const { _id, name, price, img } = props.cartItem; const [qty, setQty] = useState(props.cartItem.qty); const onQuantityIncrement = () => { setQty(qty + 1); props.onQuantityInc(_id, qty + 1); }; const onQuantityDecrement = () => { if (qty <= 1) return; setQty(qty - 1); props.onQuantityDec(_id, qty - 1); }; return ( <>

{name}

SHIRT - BLUE

COLOR: BLUE

SIZE: M

REMOVE ITEM

MOVE TO WISH LIST

$BDT {price}

); }
